get.description: Show the event feed of all mutations done on all the Azure Cosmos DB Gremlin graphs under a specific database. This helps in scenario where container was accidentally deleted. This API requires 'Microsoft.DocumentDB/locations/restorableDatabaseAccounts/.../read' permission

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
